name: Yasushi Sakurai
content: Yasushi Sakurai Yasushi Sakurai Japanese page Contact Information The Institute of Scientific and Industrial Research (ISIR) Osaka University Mihogaoka 8-1, Ibaraki, Osaka 567-0047, Japan yasushi [AT] sanken [dot] osaka-u [dot] ac [dot] jp Education Ph.D., Graduate School of Information Science, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (1996 -- 1999) M.E., Graduate School of Information Science, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (1995 -- 1996) B.E., Department of Electrical Engineering, Doshisha University (1987 -- 1991) Professional Experience Director, Artificial Intelligence Research Center, ISIR, Osaka University (Current position from 2020) Professor, The Institute of Scientific and Industrial Research, Osaka University (Current position from 2019) Senior Program Officer, Research Center for Science Systems, The Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) (2022 -- 2025) Professor, Kumamoto University (2013-2019) Visiting researcher, Carnegie Mellon University (2004 -- 2005) Research and development, NTT (1991 -- 2013) Research Interests Similarity search and pattern discovery Time-series analysis and forecasting Sensor data processing Web mining Also see Data Mining Group at Osaka University Publications Tutorials Yasushi Sakurai, Yasuko Matsubara, Christos Faloutsos: `` Smart Analytics for Big Time-series Data'', ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD), Tutorial, Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada, August 2017. Yasushi Sakurai, Yasuko Matsubara, Christos Faloutsos: `` Mining Big Time-series Data on the Web'', International World Wide Web Conference (WWW), Tutorial, pp. 1029-1032, Montreal, Canada, April 2016. Yasushi Sakurai, Yasuko Matsubara, Christos Faloutsos: `` Mining and Forecasting of Big Time-series data'', ACM SIGMOD Conference, Tutorial, pp. 919-922, Melbourne, VIC, Australia, May/June 2015. Awards Software Professional Activities Yasushi Sakurai, ISIR, Osaka University
